column3: > I don't know if it is actually useless,\n\nIf you aren't even sure if it's "useless", why did you open a Pull Request to remove it? The point of Pull Requests are not for you to randomly delete things, and leave it up to reviewers to determine if what you've removed is ok. Please read through [CONTRIBUTING.MD](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
@GyanPrakash2483 you may want to check history first (git blame for instance). In this case you need to see #18699.
Yes, the space looks like it's needed as a separator.
